name: Epic Pinball
description:
Epic Pinball is an arcade game developed by Digital Extremes and Epic Games. It was originally released in 1993. Epic MegaGames published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Epic Pinball on PC, Linux and macOS. The game is sold via GOG.
It was scored by Joshua Jensen and Robert A. Allen.
